location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to Thuwaini bin Said, Sultan of Muscat from an undisclosed author (Lewis Pelly?)

mods.abstract: Letter in Arabic, with envelope, to Thuwaini bin Said al-Said, Sultan of Muscat. The letter is most likely from Lewis Pelly, as folio 16 contains a letter to Pelly from His Highness.The letter is most likely written sometime between 1863 and 1865 as Lewis Pelly only commenced his position as Political Resident in the Persian Gulf in mid-1862 and Thuwaini bin Said was killed in February 1866.
